text: "Two Strong Hearts" is a 1988 song by Australian singer John Farnham. It is the second single from his 13th studio album Age of Reason. It went to number 6 in Australia, number 80 in the United Kingdom, number 50 in Canada and number 28 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== # "Two Strong Hearts" – 3:35 # "It's a Long Way to the Top (If You Wanna Rock 'n' Roll)" – 4:11 ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:John Farnham songs
title: Two Strong Hearts
